title: Rod Stewart Shares Romantic 17th Anniversary Photo with Wife Penny Lancaster: ‘17 Years of Love’
description: The couple celebrated their 17th wedding anniversary on June 16 after tying the knot in Italy in 2007

description: From Hollywood to New York and everywhere in between, see what your favorite stars are up to

title: Ashley Benson Denies Using Ozempic, Says She Worked 'Very Hard' to Get Her 'Body Back' After Giving Birth
description: The actress, who welcomed her daughter in February, called the social media comments accusing her of taking the weight loss drug "funny"

title: Julian Lennon Wishes ‘Uncle’ Paul McCartney Happy 82nd Birthday with Sweet ‘Hey Jude’ Clip: 'Only Love'
description: Lennon is the son of McCartney's late Beatles bandmate John Lennon and his first wife Cynthia

title: Sony Pictures Hires Production General Manager In India
description: Sony Pictures Entertainment has hired Nachiket Pantvaidya as general manager of productions in India. In the role, Pantvaidya will oversee local Indian production while working alongside Shony Panjikaran who is the general manager and head of Sony Pictures Releasing International in India. Pantvaidya was previously CEO at Balaji Telefilms and Head of Business at Sony […]

title: Ian McKellen Expected to Make ‘Speedy and Full Recovery’ After Fall from London Stage
description: The 85-year-old actor was hospitalized after reportedly losing his footing during a performance of 'Player Kings' on June 17

title: Irène Jacob, Star of ‘The Double Life of Véronique,' ‘Three Colors: Red,' to Receive Locarno Fest Honor
description: French-Swiss actress Irène Jacob, best-known for her star-making turns in Krzysztof Kieślowski’s The Double Life of Veronique (1991), and Three Colors: Red (1994), will be honored at this year’s Locarno Film Festival with the Leopard Club Award for her contribution to contemporary cinema. The award ceremony will take place at Locarno’s Piazza Grande on the […]

title: ‘Outlander' Actor Tim Downie Joins Contemporary ‘Romeo & Juliet' Adaptation ‘All That Glitters'
description: EXCLUSIVE: British actor Tim Downie (Outlander, Good Omens) has signed on to star in the feature film All That Glitters, a young adult comedy-drama inspired by Shakespeare and how his work may have been shaped by modern life. Downie has joined the cast alongside Paul Ready (Motherland), Elliot Grihault (House of the Dragon), and Mark […]

title: ‘The Commandant's Shadow,' True Account of Holocaust Horrors Fictionalized in ‘The Zone of Interest,' Unpacked by Filmmakers at Mumbai Festival
description: After Jonathan Glazer’s Cannes, Oscar and BAFTA-winning “The Zone of Interest,” Daniela Volker’s “The Commandant’s Shadow” tackles the same subject – what it was like to live next door to a WWII concentration camp. While Glazer’s film was a work of fiction, based on Martin Amis’ novel, Volker’s film is a documentary. Exploring the legacy […]

title: Irène Jacob to Be Honored by Locarno Film Festival
description: French-Swiss film and theatre actor Irène Jacob, who has worked with many of Europe’s top directors, will be honoured by the Locarno Film Festival with its Leopard Club Award. Jacob, who is originally from Switzerland, won the prestigious best actress prize at Cannes in 1991 for her part in Krzysztof Kieslowski's "The Double Life of Véronique." Kieslowski […]
